name: GLKEffectPropertyTexture
desc: Texture drawing parameters for use in GLKit rendering effects.

items.name: var enabled: GLboolean
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether this texture is used to texture drawn primitives.

items.name: var envMode: GLKTextureEnvMode
items.desc: The mode the texture uses to compute its output fragment color. See GLKTextureEnvMode.

items.name: var name: GLuint
items.desc: The OpenGL name for the texture being sampled by this texture stage.

items.name: var target: GLKTextureTarget
items.desc: The kind of texture pointed to by the texture stage. See GLKTextureTarget.

items.name: enum GLKTextureTarget
items.desc: The kind of texture pointed to by the property.

items.name: enum GLKTextureEnvMode
items.desc: The mode used to combine the texture with other color components.
